lemma elements_four_block_mat: assumes c: "A \<in> carrier_mat nr1 nc1" "B \<in> carrier_mat nr1 nc2" "C \<in> carrier_mat nr2 nc1" "D \<in> carrier_mat nr2 nc2" shows "elements_mat (four_block_mat A B C D) \<subseteq> elements_mat A \<union> elements_mat B \<union> elements_mat C \<union> elements_mat D" (is "elements_mat ?four \<subseteq> _")
